
1. Configure your content and code sources
curl -X PUT https://admin.hlx.page/config/ComwrapUkReply/sites/ue-multitenant-root.json \
  -H 'content-type: application/json' \
  -H 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ijdzb2k4N3pkb3NJRnc4b19fbVR5a082QlVRNEZBVGhjaHlyNGZqY1dSbWcifQ..gOWshIM3iYCWSu-lZu7flLP6YuiGprRuyzfwPdVltDxwXVPc1crIcYuaHJpiAB-kafD_tIr3U7cdCdZk4masS_-cHkHBqaF6ByjR62cmfBMsxgkXWAp3mHEfEglzeLznzjYGI7RSNLWJFGhY9g0O1bnP8MIMkUM3KMUEIzZK41cG6_sxsPdu6M6F1Tlkp4saLWz4m13_mWDMbd2gv_ObNm7FKjmQS_18Jc2g5vN7LTmncFWxkz0mWBVJ0mPspw7AsUmSzlS5UQ3IBx_ZI6GjNRIRyVpb7N3YjHLrYTb6SqIPSFNM_Y3qle1gSR5_Uxde7nAOp2vnMU9-sGe2BFfD9g' \
  --data '{
  "version": 1,
  "code": {
    "owner": “ComwrapUkReply",
    "repo": "ue-multitenant-root",
    "source": {
      "type": "github",
      "url": "https://github.com/ComwrapUkReply/ue-multitenant-root"

  },

      "url": "https://author-p24706-e491522.adobeaemcloud.com/bin/franklin.delivery/ComwrapUkReply/ue-multitenant-root/main“,
      "type": "markup",
      "suffix": ".html"
    }
  }
}'

curl -s https://main--ue-multitenant-root--ComwrapUkReply.aem.live/config.json | jq .



1. Add path mapping for site configuration and set technical account
curl --request POST \
  --url https://admin.hlx.page/config/ComwrapUkReply/sites/ue-multitenant-root/public.json \
  --header 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ijdzb2k4N3pkb3NJRnc4b19fbVR5a082QlVRNEZBVGhjaHlyNGZqY1dSbWcifQ..gOWshIM3iYCWSu-lZu7flLP6YuiGprRuyzfwPdVltDxwXVPc1crIcYuaHJpiAB-kafD_tIr3U7cdCdZk4masS_-cHkHBqaF6ByjR62cmfBMsxgkXWAp3mHEfEglzeLznzjYGI7RSNLWJFGhY9g0O1bnP8MIMkUM3KMUEIzZK41cG6_sxsPdu6M6F1Tlkp4saLWz4m13_mWDMbd2gv_ObNm7FKjmQS_18Jc2g5vN7LTmncFWxkz0mWBVJ0mPspw7AsUmSzlS5UQ3IBx_ZI6GjNRIRyVpb7N3YjHLrYTb6SqIPSFNM_Y3qle1gSR5_Uxde7nAOp2vnMU9-sGe2BFfD9g' \
  --data '{
    "paths": {
        "mappings": [
            "/content/ue-multitenant-root/:/",
            "/content/ue-multitenant-root/configuration:/.helix/config.json"
   ],
        "includes": [
            "/content/ue-multitenant-root/“,
            "/content/dam/ue-multitenant-root/"
        ]
    }
}'

3.
curl 'https://main--ue-multitenant-root--ComwrapUkReply.aem.live/config.json'

4.Set the technical account for your repoless configuration
Technical account ID: B0AC1E69623B0F1F0A495EC0@techacct.adobe.com

curl --request POST \
  --url https://admin.hlx.page/config/ComwrapUkReply/sites/ue-multitenant-root/access.json \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-auth-token: eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ijdzb2k4N3pkb3NJRnc4b19fbVR5a082QlVRNEZBVGhjaHlyNGZqY1dSbWcifQ..gOWshIM3iYCWSu-lZu7flLP6YuiGprRuyzfwPdVltDxwXVPc1crIcYuaHJpiAB-kafD_tIr3U7cdCdZk4masS_-cHkHBqaF6ByjR62cmfBMsxgkXWAp3mHEfEglzeLznzjYGI7RSNLWJFGhY9g0O1bnP8MIMkUM3KMUEIzZK41cG6_sxsPdu6M6F1Tlkp4saLWz4m13_mWDMbd2gv_ObNm7FKjmQS_18Jc2g5vN7LTmncFWxkz0mWBVJ0mPspw7AsUmSzlS5UQ3IBx_ZI6GjNRIRyVpb7N3YjHLrYTb6SqIPSFNM_Y3qle1gSR5_Uxde7nAOp2vnMU9-sGe2BFfD9g' \
  --data '{
    "admin": {
        "role": {
            "admin": [
                “s.sznajder@reply.com”
            ],
            "config_admin": [
                "B0AC1E69623B0F1F0A495EC0@techacct.adobe.com"
            ]
        },
        "requireAuth": "auto"
    }
}'
